item.title: Bulletin updated at 11:56 HKT 31/07/2019
item.description:
At 11 a.m. at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 27 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 93 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 3
Intensity of UV radiation : moderate

Gusts reaching 80 kilometres per hour or above may continue to affect Hong Kong.

Please be reminded that:
The Tropical Cyclone Signal No. 3 has been issued.
The Hong Kong Observatory announces that the Tropical Cyclone Warning Signal Number 8 is expected to be issued at or before 2:00 p.m. today (31 Jul 2019).
The Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal was issued at 11:55 a.m.
The Thunderstorm Warning has been issued. It will remain effective until 3:00 p.m. today. Squally thunderstorms are expected to occur over Hong Kong.
